data.apiNameCn: 国际客票变更搜索(订单)
data.introduce: 国际客票变更搜索(订单)AirIntlReShopOrder服务为用户提供了带订单查询国际客票变更费等航班信息功能的服务。
data.business: 国际客票变更搜索（订单）
data.functions: 支持根据航段信息，票号，查询日期来查询国际客票变更费等航班信息；相比较非订单接口，添加了对订单号的验证和订单号和票号的匹配验证。
data.requestSchema:
[{"name":"TRR_VoluntaryReshopRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"BookingOrderID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"订单号：1.此处填入IBE+预订订单号，如未在IBE+生成过预订单，请先通过订单同步接口导入线下商家订单 2.该订单号状态须是出票完成","children":[]},{"name":"TicketInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客信息","children":[{"name":"TicketNo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票号：13位票号或14位票号","children":[]},{"name":"PassengerName","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"ValidatingCarrier","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司（承运人）两字码","children":[]}]},{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"HostCode","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"CRS时是1E ICS时是航空公司两字代码","children":[]},{"name":"TicketingCity","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"DepartmentCode","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"   ","description":"CRS 当是AGENT 9或者是USER GROUP 17且在PEK099时显示TST，否则是3个空格。
						ICS 当是AGENT 9或者是USER GROUP
						17且在PEK099时显示TST，否则是C+航空公司代码。","children":[]},{"name":"OfficeCode","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"变更操作OFFICE","children":[]},{"name":"IataCode","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"变更操作office的IATA NO","children":[]}]},{"name":"Segments","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"原行程的航段信 息：已飞航班和 地面段可以 不 填 写 到 Segment","children":[{"name":"Segment","type":"object","quantity":"0..16","default":"","description":"所有未飞航班的 航班信息","children":[{"name":"FlightId","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班的唯一编号,建议为两位数字","children":[]},{"name":"MarketingCarrier","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司（承运人）两字码","children":[]},{"name":"FlightNo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班号 1、正常航班：填写航班号 2、OPEN航班：填写“OPEN”","children":[]},{"name":"CabinCode","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"舱位等级","children":[]},{"name":"OperatingCarrier","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航空公司（承运人）两字码","children":[]},{"name":"DepartureDateTime","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"日期时间,格式：YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MI","children":[]},{"name":"DepartureCity","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"ArrivalDateTime","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"日期时间,格式：YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MI","children":[]},{"name":"ArrivalCity","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"Equipment","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"机型：1、正常航班：必填；2、OPEN航班：不填写此字段","children":[]},{"name":"BookingStatus","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"OperatingCabinCode","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"OperatingFlightNo","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"NewSegments","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"变更行程的筛选 条件：变更行程的筛选 条件","children":[{"name":"NewSegment","type":"object","quantity":"0..16","default":"","description":"变更行程的筛选 条件","children":[{"name":"Origin","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"变更航段起始地","children":[{"name":"Name","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"Type","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]},{"name":"Destination","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"变更航段到达地","children":[{"name":"Name","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"Type","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]},{"name":"FlexInterval","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"From","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"To","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]},{"name":"DepartDate","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"DepartBeforeTime","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"DepartAfterTime","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"CoveredSegments","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"新行程对应的旧 航段信息：当前仅支持航段一对一的变更，且不能 变更 OD","children":[{"name":"FlightId","type":"object","quantity":"0..16","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"ReshopPreference","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"FareRuleRestriction","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"国际运价的参数：取值为 true，则新运价必须是可变更","children":[{"name":"Changeable","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"Refundable","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"upgradable","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]},{"name":"FareTypes","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"新票运价类型， 可指定一个或者 多个","children":[{"name":"FareType","type":"array","quantity":"0..4","default":"","description":"PUBLIC：公布运价 PRIVATE：私有/协议运价
									IT_PUBLIC：IT公布运价
									IT_PRIVATE：IT私有/协议运价","children":[]}]},{"name":"AccountCode","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"金额","children":[{"name":"Code","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"AllowBlank","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"true：可以是其他运价；false:必须是此accountCode的运价","children":[]}]},{"name":"PassengerType","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Type","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"ExactPtcMatch","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否返回指定旅客类型的运价
									true:仅返回指定旅客类型的运价；
									false:全部返回","children":[]}]},{"name":"CurrencyOfPayment","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"新票的支付货币代码","children":[]},{"name":"Waiver","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"豁免代码:
						01  DEATH
						02  ILLNESS
						03  ACT_OF_GOD
						04 COURT_APPEARANCE
						05 MILITARY
						06 TOUR_PACKAGE
						07 LACK_DOCUMENTATION","children":[]},{"name":"FlightPreference","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航班的偏好信息","children":[{"name":"Cabins","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"舱位等级","children":[{"name":"Cabin","type":"array","quantity":"0..99","default":"","description":"舱位等级：ECONOMY 、PREMIUM_ECONOMY 、BUSINESS、 FIRST、Y 、W 、C、 F等","children":[]}]},{"name":"AllowCodeshare","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"是否允许返回代码共享航班可以不设置，默认为true，表示允许返回代码共享航班","children":[]},{"name":"AllowInterline","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"是否允许返回联运航班，可以不设置，默认为true
									ture-联运结果允许online和interline
									false-联运结果仅返回online","children":[]},{"name":"FlightsAllowedMarketingCarriers","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"允许的市场方航 司：可以不设置，默认为空，表示允许所有 市场方航空公司，设置后不能使用 flightsForbiddenMarketingCarrier","children":[{"name":"Carrier","type":"object","quantity":"0..99","default":"","description":"航空公司（承运人）两字码","children":[]}]},{"name":"FlightsForbiddenMarketingCarriers","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"不允许返回的承运方航司,可以不设置，默认为空，表示允许所有承运方航空公司，设置后不能使用flightsAllowedMarketingCarriers","children":[{"name":"Carrier","type":"object","quantity":"0..99","default":"","description":"航空公司（承运人）两字码","children":[]}]},{"name":"FaresAllowedCarriers","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"可以使用所有航 空公司发布的运 价：可以不设置，默认为空，表示可以使用 所有航空公司发布的运价；设置后表示 只能使用这些航空公司的运","children":[{"name":"Carrier","type":"object","quantity":"0..99","default":"","description":"航空公司（承运人）两字码","children":[]}]},{"name":"FlightsAllowedOperatingCarriers","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"允许返回的承运航司,可以不设置，默认为空，表示可以使用所有航空公司发布的运价；设置后表示只能使用这些航空公司的运价","children":[{"name":"Carrier","type":"object","quantity":"0..99","default":"","description":"航空公司（承运人）两字码","children":[]}]},{"name":"ProcessVirtualCabinCombos","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"CabinCombo","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"BrandSource","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"BrandCommercialName","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]}]}]}]

						ACT_OF_GOD
						COURT_APPEARANCE
						DEATH
						ILLNESS
						LACK_DOCUMENTATION
						MILITARY
						TOUR_PACKAGE
						与TRI指令对应关系如下：
						01 DEATH
						02 ILLNESS
						03 ACT_OF_GOD
						04 COURT_APPEARANCE
						05 MILITARY
						06 TOUR_PACKAGE
						07 LACK_DOCUMENTATION","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Fares","type":"array","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Fare","type":"object","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Id","type":"string","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"Origin","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"运价始发地：票价的始发地。输出为：机场或城市 以外的航段","children":[]},{"name":"MarketingCarrier","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司（承运人）两字码","children":[]},{"name":"MarketingFlightNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"市场方航空公司航班号：就是航班号。
